alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 13 at 8:01PM MST until December 15 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TUESDAY TO 8 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts 60 to 65 mph in Southern Johnson County. In the mountains wind speeds of 45 to 55 mph with gusts to 75 mph are expected. * WHERE...Bighorn Mountains Southeast and Southern Johnson County. * WHEN...From 2 AM Tuesday to 8 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Use caution if you must drive. In a parking lot, park into the wind to minimize the possibility of your car door hitting another parked vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Southeast Johnson County
